.. _usersguide:

============
User's Guide
============

Welcome to the NPAT User's Guide!  The user's guide is an introduction to the essential classes in NPAT, along with some example usage.  For more details about the methods and attributes of these classes, visit the NPAT :ref:`api`.

.. toctree::
    :numbered:
    :maxdepth: 2

    getting_started
    spectroscopy
    decay
    isotopes
    stopping
    examples
    troubleshoot
